SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Category
The Category class represents a category with a name and description.
Client
The Client class represents a client with a username, name, password, and age.
Controller
The Controller class handles the interaction between the view and the model.
IllegalDateException
The IllegalDateException is thrown when an invalid date is encountered.
ImplementDB
 
Main
The Main class serves as the entry point for the application.
ModelDAO
The ModelDAO interface provides methods for client authentication and task management.
Task
The Task class represents a task with an ID, name, description, due date, state, username, and category.
Task_state_Enum
The TaskStateEnum class represents the state of a task.
WindowAddTask
The WindowAddTask class represents a dialog window for adding a new task.
WindowDeleteTask
The WindowDeleteTask class represents a dialog window for deleting an existing task.
WindowLogin
The WindowLogin class represents the login window for the application.
WindowMenu
The WindowMenu class represents the main menu window for the application.
WindowModifyTask
The WindowModifyTask class represents a dialog window for modifying an existing task.
WindowShowTasks
The WindowShowTasks class represents a dialog window for displaying tasks.
WindowSignUp
The WindowSignUp class represents a dialog window for user sign-up.
